name: Fromage Frenzy (Will Harding)
description:
The first major group project game. Our prompt was to make a "Lane based racer", and we came up with the idea of racing cheese wheels because we're pretty mature.

It's a racing game but you're restricted to the 5 lanes, so more Temple Run and less Mario Kart. Although there are some powerups and stuff, so a little Mario Kart.

I was one of two coders on this project, I made: the cheese movement across the track; the UI code; the race management (racer positioning); shortcuts; inputs; menus;  minimap; and probably other random bits and pieces in the rest of it I either bugfixed or forgot about.
